title: Lion Snapping at a Butterfly
credit_line: Gift of the Thomas H. Nimick, Jr. Family in memory of Florence Lockhart Nimick
provenance_text:
Jean-Léon Gérôme [1824-1904], Paris, France. Charles Lockhart [1818-1905], Pittsburgh, PA, until January 26, 1905; by descent to his great-granddaughter, Florence Dilworth Lockhart Nimick [1934-1981], Ligonier, PA and Pittsburgh, PA until May 1981 [1]; her husband, Thomas Howe Nimick, Jr. [1923-2007], Ligonier, PA and Pittsburgh, PA; gift to Carnegie Museum of Art, Pittsburgh, PA, October 1992.

Notes:
[1]. Mrs. Nimick's father was Charles Lockhart, whose father was James Henry Lockhart (died May 16, 1938), son of Charles Lockhart, the Pittsburgh family's patriarch.

creator.death_place: Paris (Ville de Paris department, Île-de-France, France)
